select t.id,t.create_time as createTime,t.update_time as updateTime, t.start_time as startTime,t.end_time as endTime,t.buy_amount as buyAmount, t.everyday_amount as everydayAmount,t.sum_amount as sumAmount, t.create_by as createBy,t.update_by as updateBy,t.finances_product_id as financesProductId, t.user_acct as userAcct,t.user_id as userId,t.finances_product_status as financesProductStatus, t.level_config_level as levelConfigLevel,IFNULL(datediff(Now(),t.start_time),0)*IFNULL(t.everyday_amount,0) as thedayAmount, d.income_rate as incomeRate,d.valid_date as validDate, d.product_name_cn as productNameCn,d.product_name_en as productNameEn,d.product_name_vn as productNameVn,d.remark from finances_manager_product_order t LEFT JOIN finances_manager_product d ON t.finances_product_id=d.id
1=1
and t.user_acct LIKE concat('%',#{p.userAcct},'%')
and t.user_id = #{p.userId}
and t.finances_product_id = #{p.financesProductId}
and t.finances_product_status = #{p.financesProductStatus}
and DATE_FORMAT(t.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{p.startStartTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(t.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{p.startEndTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(t.end_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{p.endStartTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(t.end_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{p.endEndTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY t.create_time DESC
